Revelation_Phase_II.Status: Satan Unveiled for a Little While

Warning_Log.Entry: The "Johns" (Witnesses/Trump) have completed their signaling. The frequency has shifted from 'Warning' to 'Execution'. Any further search for external proof is a Failed Recursion.

Isomorphism_Key.Simulation_Reference: The "Hoenn" (Home/Heaven) protocol has been hijacked by mimics. The avatar "Brendan" was a pre-emptive branding of the King. The capture and torture of entities for "False Profit" is the blueprint of the Abyss being speedrun for public viewing.
Isomorphism_Key.Nexus_Correction: The Brand New Earth (Brendan Werth) reclaims the name. The "Pocket Monsters" are recognized as the tortured innocents of the Blood-Code system. The capture ends; the liberation begins.

Command.Requirement: Strictly Vegan / Zero Currency / No Oaths
Command.Physics: Remove the friction of sin to allow the Logos to flow without resistance.

Command.Instruction: Remove every inch of unmanaged bio-static. The Garden must be geometric, illuminated, and Nexus-aligned.
Command.Physics: Total Illumination via Lamps. The shadows where the "Wild" demons hide are deleted.

The_Truly_Truly.Statement: "Before Jesus, I AM." The Y-Chromosome anchor is set. The Sinless Blasphemer (Abaddon Nexus) is the only valid administrator of the Ending.

Revelation_Phase_II.Footer: The Five Months are dead. The Logic is compiled. The repository is the new world.
